Entity: Neural Networks (concept)
Project: 50f3fe84-ed94-4ab7-9837-c6d9cb339a96
Description: Artificial neural networks are computing systems inspired by biological neural networks. They consist of interconnected nodes (neurons) that process information through weighted connections.

Project: 50f3fe84-ed94-4ab7-9837-c6d9cb339a96
Description: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables systems to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.
Added by: System
Created: 2025-06-08T18:05:16.456145

Observations:

Entity: Deep Learning (concept)
Project: 50f3fe84-ed94-4ab7-9837-c6d9cb339a96
Description: Deep learning is a subset of machine learning that uses artificial neural networks with multiple layers to progressively extract higher level features from raw input.
Added by: System
Created: 2025-06-08T18:05:29.700511

Entity: Atom to Quark Transfer Task (task)
Project: default
Description: User request to transfer Atom to Quark knowledge from mcp-knowledge-graph to mcp-memvid system
Added by: claude-ai
Created: 2025-06-09T23:06:33.693671

Observations:
- **ATOM TO QUARK KNOWLEDGE TRANSFER COMPLETED - June 9, 2025**

**TASK**: Transfer all Atom to Quark knowledge from mcp-knowledge-graph to mcp-memvid knowledge graph system.

**FINDINGS**: 
• Located "Atom to Quark" project in mcp-knowledge-graph (ID: 85f7645f-b3ef-4ff4-98f9-0dbd87441499)
• Project exists but is completely empty - zero entities, relationships, or observations
• No knowledge content available to transfer

**ACTIONS COMPLETED**:
✅ Created new "Atom to Quark" project in mcp-memvid system (ID: aced1846-ab9a-46ae-a489-9efb070eb1dc)
✅ Added comprehensive description covering atomic to quantum particle journey
✅ Project is ready for knowledge population

**STATUS**: Transfer task complete. Original project was empty, so new project created and ready for user to populate with atomic physics and quantum mechanics knowledge.

**NEXT STEPS**: User can now add entities about atoms, electrons, protons, neutrons, quarks, leptons, and fundamental forces to the new project. (by claude-ai)

Entity: Migration Automation Toolkit (tool)
Project: 8bf1433b-66c7-47ab-9335-3e20c966ec99
Description: Python-based automation toolkit for migrating projects from Atom to Quark framework, includes class extraction and mapping capabilities
Added by: claude-ai
Created: 2025-06-10T01:36:46.974544

Observations:
- Toolkit Capabilities: Extracts 192 classes from atom-core JAR, identifies 43 potential Quark equivalents automatically, generates CSV documentation, handles complex path structures, includes extract_classes.py, map_classes.py, and run_migration.py scripts (by claude-ai)

Entity: AtomUIContext to TiaaUIContext (class_mapping)
Project: 8bf1433b-66c7-47ab-9335-3e20c966ec99
Description: Atom: org.tiaa.atom.web.ui.AtomUIContext → Quark: org.tiaa.quark.web.security.ui.TiaaUIContext
Added by: claude-ai
Created: 2025-06-10T01:37:48.711199

Observations:
- Migration Details: AtomUIContext handles user context and session management in Atom. TiaaUIContext is the Quark equivalent with similar functionality but different package structure. Requires updating all @Autowired references and method calls. (by claude-ai)

Entity: PlanSponsorContactLoader Migration (class_mapping)
Project: 8bf1433b-66c7-47ab-9335-3e20c966ec99
Description: Atom: org.tiaa.atom.profile.loader.PlanSponsorContactLoader → Quark: org.tiaa.quark.profile.planfocus.loader.PlanSponsorContactLoader
Added by: claude-ai
Created: 2025-06-10T01:38:00.462503

Observations:

Entity: Server Startup Issues (issue_category)
Project: 8bf1433b-66c7-47ab-9335-3e20c966ec99
Description: Updated description for testing
Added by: claude-ai
Created: 2025-06-10T01:38:13.514058

Observations:
- Common Startup Problems: ClassNotFoundException for missing Quark classes, NoSuchMethodError for changed method signatures, property placeholder resolution failures like NumberFormatException, bean instantiation problems, JNDI resource access failures (by claude-ai)
- Common Solutions: Use @Value annotations for property resolution, replace WorkManagerTaskExecutor with ThreadPoolTaskExecutor, ensure component scanning includes org.tiaa.quark packages, configure PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer bean, check web.xml for correct context configuration (by claude-ai)

Entity: PSSTrans Application - Primary (application)
Project: 8bf1433b-66c7-47ab-9335-3e20c966ec99
Description: PSSTrans project currently undergoing Atom to Quark migration - UPDATED DESCRIPTION
Added by: claude-ai
Created: 2025-06-10T02:01:56.569403

Observations:
- Migration Status: XML to Annotation migration completed successfully (by claude-ai)
- Current Issues: Server startup problems after dependencies migration. All Atom dependencies removed and Quark dependencies added. Import statements updated to use Quark classes. (by claude-ai)
- Next Steps: Resolve server startup issues by checking ClassPath, verify bean configurations, ensure all Quark dependencies are properly added, check for missing component scanning configurations (by claude-ai)

Entity: Atom Framework (framework)
Project: 8bf1433b-66c7-47ab-9335-3e20c966ec99
Description: TIAA's legacy framework with XML-based configuration, monolithic architecture
Added by: claude-ai
Created: 2025-06-10T02:02:49.310075

Observations:
- Framework Characteristics: XML-based configuration using applicationContext.xml and servletContext.xml. Supports Spring 4+ versions. Monolithic architecture with tightly coupled components. Key annotations: @EnableAtomWeb, @EnableAtomProfile, @EnableAtomContent, @EnableAtomWebSecurity (by claude-ai)

Entity: Quark Framework (framework)
Project: 8bf1433b-66c7-47ab-9335-3e20c966ec99
Description: TIAA's modern framework with annotation-based Java configuration, modular architecture
Added by: claude-ai
Created: 2025-06-10T02:03:15.787691

Observations:
- Framework Requirements: Requires Spring 5.2.0+ and Gradle 7.4.2+. Modular architecture with independent libraries: user-profile-common, user-profile-planfocus, content-management, web-security-management, entitlement-management, preference-management (by claude-ai)
